article_title: PART ONE: For NC Medicaid program, is 'broken' a bad rap?
article_text: North Carolina has held per-patient costs down more effectively than many states. But a poor economy and tight state budget have brought budget pressure, and Republicans now in control see Medicaid as a prime example of government gone haywire.

article_metadata.title: PART ONE: For NC Medicaid program, is 'broken' a bad rap? | News & Observer
